data.name: Skullforged Pants
data.description: Leggings reinforced with bone fragments and adorned with miniature skulls. Each step leaves faint glowing footprints of earth magic while granting exceptional speed and perception.

effects.description: Adds 250 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30% Earth Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
Adds 4% Fire Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 4% Air Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 70 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)
Adds 4 Threat to its stats when equipped.
Adds 150 Initiative to its stats when equipped.
Adds 8 Haste to its stats when equipped. The haste reduces the cooldown of a fight.

data.name: Dust Helmet
data.description: A menacing helm that constantly emits wisps of golden dust. The enchanted particles amplify fire magic and enhance perception, revealing treasures and dangers alike.

effects.description: Adds 300 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 25% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 50 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)
Adds 7% Earth Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 7% Water Res to its stats when equipped.
Adds 100 Initiative to its stats when equipped.
Adds 7 Threat to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Dust Sword
data.description: A blade that leaves trails of glowing dust with each swing. The enchanted particles ignite on impact, channeling concentrated fire magic that melts through enemy defenses.

effects.description: Adds 115 Fire Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Moonlight Staff
data.description: A luminous staff crowned with a crescent-shaped crystal that glows with pale blue light. Water magic flows through it like a river, focusing into devastating critical strikes.

effects.description: Adds 96 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 35% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).

data.name: Dust Amulet
data.description: A pendant containing swirling golden dust in a crystal chamber. The magical particles enhance the wearer's vitality and combat prowess while occasionally igniting with fire magic.

effects.description: Adds 200 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Fire Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 30% Damage to its stats when equipped.
Adds 5% Critical Strike to its stats when equipped. Critical strikes adds 50% extra damage to an attack (1.5x).
Adds 100 Initiative to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Codex Page
data.description: A weathered parchment torn from an ancient tome. Mysterious symbols shift and change when viewed directly, containing forgotten knowledge of the desert's secrets.

data.name: Desert Scorpion Carapace
data.description: The hardened exoskeleton of a massive desert scorpion. Its natural resistance to extreme temperatures makes it ideal for crafting protective desert gear.

data.name: Desert Scorpion Meat
data.description: Succulent white meat from a desert scorpion's tail. Though potentially toxic when raw, proper cooking transforms it into a delicacy with restorative properties.

data.name: Cooked Desert Scorpion Meat
data.description: Perfectly grilled scorpion meat with a savory, spicy flavor. The natural compounds in the meat provide exceptional healing and temporary heat resistance.

effects.description: Heal 800 HP when the item is used.

data.name: Sandwhisper Codex
data.description: An ancient tome bound in scorpion leather with pages that whisper secrets when turned. The knowledge contained within grants enhanced vitality and combat prowess to its bearer.

effects.description: Adds 200 HP to its stats when equipped.
Adds 20% Damage to its stats when equipped.

data.name: Adamantite Axe
data.description: This axe boasts a blade forged from rare adamantite, gleaming with a subtle blue sheen. Its legendary edge makes short work of even the thickest timber.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -60% when a character logs a tree.

data.name: Adamantite Pickaxe
data.description: A pickaxe of unmatched strength, forged from pure adamantite. Its enchanted head cracks open the toughest stone veins, prized by master miners.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -60% when a character mines a resource.

data.name: Adamantite Fishing Rod
data.description: A rod crafted from adamantite alloy, both flexible and impossibly strong. With this tool, legendary aquatic creatures are within any angler's reach.

effects.description: Adds 5 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -60% when a character is fishing.

data.name: Adamantite Gloves
data.description: Impeccably made gloves lined with adamantite threads. They grant superior grip and tactile sensitivity, allowing the wearer to harvest rare herbs with ease.

effects.description: Adds 5 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Reduces cooldown by -60% when a character harvest a plant.

data.name: Voidstone Axe
data.description: An axe imbued with the power of the void. Its obsidian blade slices through wood and reveals hidden riches with every swing, favored by treasure hunters.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 100 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)
Reduces cooldown by -70% when a character logs a tree.

data.name: Voidstone Gloves
data.description: Gloves woven from void-infused fiber. They let the wearer sense and harvest rare plants, boosting both gathering speed and the chance to find valuables.

effects.description: Adds 5 Air Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 100 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)
Reduces cooldown by -70% when a character harvest a plant.

data.name: Voidstone Fishing Rod
data.description: This fishing rod pulses with void energy, its line shimmering in the light. It attracts rare and magical fish from even the deepest waters and increases the chance of valuable finds.

effects.description: Adds 5 Water Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 100 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)
Reduces cooldown by -70% when a character is fishing.

data.name: Voidstone Pickaxe
data.description: A pickaxe forged from voidstone, its edge humming with otherworldly power. It carves through rock and reveals hidden veins of precious minerals.

effects.description: Adds 5 Earth Attack to its stats when equipped.
Adds 100 Prospecting to its stats when equipped. Each PP increases your chance of obtaining drops in combat and with skills. (1% extra per 10 PP)
Reduces cooldown by -70% when a character mines a resource.
